sentences.en: But the spinet was too big for me to play.
sentences.cn: 但是钢琴太大了不适合我弹.

sentences.en: His nails resemble the ivory keys of the spinet.
sentences.cn: 他的指甲象白色的琴键一样.

sentences.en: One afternoon, when I was better, I played the spinet.
sentences.cn: 有天下午, 我好了一点时, 便弹奏钢琴.

trans.tran_cn: 小型拨弦古钢琴，竖琴，古竖琴，小钢琴
